about: I'm Nazakat Ali, a results-driven MERN Stack Developer with a proven track record of crafting exceptional web experiences. With over a year of hands-on experience in the MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) stack, I've dedicated myself to building dynamic, user-centric solutions. My journey began with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from Khawaja Fareed University. Since then, I've been committed to staying at the forefront of web development, constantly honing my skills. One of my standout projects is the Nifty Project. It's a groundbreaking platform that reimagines the digital asset marketplace, taking inspiration from Open Sea. By harnessing advanced smart contracts, React, Node, MongoDB, and Redis, we've created a platform that enables user interactions, social connections, real-time chat, and more. If you're seeking a passionate MERN Stack Developer with a focus on delivering results, let's connect. I'm eager to explore new opportunities and collaborate on exciting projects that push the boundaries of web development.
